content:
/>
IX.iii.1.l.2.
a
.
Social Security Lump-Sum Death Benefit
Count the Social Security lump-sum death benefit for one year beginning the first day of the month after the month in which it was received.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
